pr_title: [NCL-6158]: Add 'Brew pull active' flag on build config

timeline.bodyText:
Not final. You will have to solve the default differently.
Note: @JsonProperty(defaultValue="false") is only for ducumenting default value, not setting it.
timeline.author: janinko
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -104,6 +104,11 @@
      */
     protected final String defaultAlignmentParams;
 
+    /**
+     * Indicates whether the Brew Bridge Pull feature is active or not. It defaults to false.
+     */
+    protected boolean brewPullActive = false;

replies.bodyText: Since false is a default for a boolean field, is it possible to drop the "=false" and rely on the java default?
replies.author: pkocandr
